```{r setup, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}


suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(huxtable))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr)) 


knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

ht <- hux(a = rep("LEFT CONTENT", 2), b = rep("RIGHT CONTENT", 2))
background_color(ht) <- 'red'
bottom_border(ht)[1, 1] <- 4
bottom_border(ht)[1, 2] <- 0
top_border(ht)[2, 2] <- 0
caption(ht) <- 'Bottom border of first row first column 4pt; second column 0pt. Should work.'
ht


```
